message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I know you'll love. I'm starting with a price of $180, but I'm open to negotiation. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle at $150?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and I understand you're looking for a good deal. While $120 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to come down to $160. This is still a great price considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $160, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so how about $140?
